SpheromancerHeart.NAME: Spheromancer Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: Give you 3SP at the start of each fight.

leacrosscode:PreciseFocus.NAME: Precise focus
DESCRIPTIONS: +1 Wave NL Enemies with Target takes one more damage from BULLETS.

leacrosscode:MartialCounterAttack.NAME: Martial CounterAttack
DESCRIPTIONS: +1 Cold NL You gain 1 Vigor for each damage reduced by Protection.
